burgers.title: Ranger-Burger
burgers.description: 100% beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, fresh onions, cucumber, tomato, fresh Iceberg lettuce and special sauce on a caramelized bun with sesame.

burgers.title: Hamburger
burgers.description: Burger made of a 100% pure beef patty, onions, pickles and just the right amount of mustard and ketchup wrapped in a caramelized bun.

burgers.title: Fish-Burger
burgers.description: Fried, breaded crispy fish fillet served on a bun, with fresh Iceberg lettuce, special sauce and sliced tomato.

burgers.title: Chicken-Burger
burgers.description: Fried, crispy chicken fillet served on a caramelized bun, with fresh Iceberg lettuce, special sauce, tomato and sliced cucumber.

burgers.title: Vegan-Burger
burgers.description: Join us to savor our Ultimate Vegan Burger, featuring a crispy plant-based patty topped with dairy-free cheese and a tangy vegan tartar sauce, all nestled within a freshly toasted bun.

burgers.title: Vegan-Paradise
burgers.description: Join us to savor our Ultimate Vegan Burger, featuring a crispy plant-based patty topped with dairy-free cheese and a tangy vegan tartar sauce, all nestled within a freshly toasted bun.

burgers.title: MacChicken
burgers.description: 100% chicken breast fillet in a crispy, crunchy coating. Served with iceberg lettuce, ranch sauce and sesame topped bun.

burgers.title: Rocket-Chicken
burgers.description: Chicken patty, 3 pieces Emmental cheeses, onions, juicy tomatoes and Grill sauce all nestled in a caramelized bun with sesame.

burgers.title: Beef-King
burgers.description: It's two 100% beef patties, 1 melted Cheddar cheese, onions, pickles, Iceberg lettuce and special sauce that make the Big Mac a special bun with sesame.
